pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.1: When it comes to the offenses that are a result of consenting to physical contact, to how many of the four kinds of failure do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.2: They belong to two kinds of failure:
pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.3: they may be failure in morality; they may be failure in conduct. …
pli-tv-pvr2.11:2.1: When it comes to the offenses that are a result of asking for curd and then eating it, to how many of the four kinds of failure do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.11:2.2: They belong to one kind of failure:
pli-tv-pvr2.11:3.1: The third section on failure is finished.
